member.name: T:AStar.Dev.Files.Classifications.Api.EndpointConstants
member.summary: Provides constant values related to API endpoints for file classifications in the application.
member.remarks: This class contains static string constants that are used across the application for defining and interacting with the file classifications API. These constants include endpoint names, group names, and tags.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Files.Classifications.Api.EndpointConstants.GetFileClassificationsName
member.summary: Gets the name identifier for the "Get File Classifications" operation, formatted as a single string with spaces removed to ensure uniqueness. This is primarily used to reference the operation in code, routing, or documentation.
member.value: A string value "GetFileClassifications", derived from the GetFileClassificationsGroupName by removing all spaces.
member.example:
Below is an example of how to access and use GetFileClassificationsName:
string endpointName = EndpointConstants.GetFileClassificationsName; Console.WriteLine(endpointName); // Output: "GetFileClassifications"
This can also be used as part of an endpoint definition:
endPointBuilder .MapGet("/", handler) .WithName(EndpointConstants.GetFileClassificationsName);

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Files.Classifications.Api.EndpointConstants.GetFileClassificationsGroupName
member.summary: Gets the group name identifier for the "Get File Classifications" operation. This name is primarily used to define endpoint groups, versioning, and documentation for the API.
member.value: A string value "Get File Classifications", representing a human-readable description of the operation group.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Files.Classifications.Api.EndpointConstants.FileClassificationsTag
member.summary: Represents a tag identifier for the "File Classifications" API endpoints. This tag is used to categorize and group all related endpoints under the "File Classifications" category in documentation or middleware handling.
member.value: A string value "File Classifications" that serves as the descriptive tag for endpoints associated with handling file classifications.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Files.Classifications.Api.EndpointConstants.FileClassificationsEndpoint
member.summary: Represents the endpoint path for handling file classifications API requests. This value is used to define the base route when mapping the endpoint within the application.
member.value: A string value representing the base path of the file classifications endpoint, currently set to "/api/file-classifications".
member.example:
Example usage of the FileClassificationsEndpoint:
var endpointPath = EndpointConstants.FileClassificationsEndpoint; Console.WriteLine(endpointPath); // Output: "/api/file-classifications"
This value is typically used as part of an endpoint route definition:
endpointRouteBuilder .MapGroup(EndpointConstants.FileClassificationsEndpoint) .MapGet("/", handler) .WithTags(EndpointConstants.FileClassificationsTag);
You can also access it dynamically to construct full endpoint routes:
string fullUrl = $"{baseApiUrl}{EndpointConstants.FileClassificationsEndpoint}"; Console.WriteLine(fullUrl); // Output: "https://example.com/api/file-classifications"
